hud-message.failed-set-font: {{fontType}} set failed. See SMAPI console for details.
ui.main-menu.title: Font Settings
ui.main-menu.font-type-help.paragraph: There're mainly three types of fonts in Stardew Valley: Small Font, Medium Font, Dialogue Font. Press the left or right arrow to switch. You may only set one or two, or all of them, based on you liking.
ui.main-menu.font-type-help.latin-lang.p:
Latin Language:
For those languages only contains latin characters (current {{locale}}), they just use game's default font as Dialogue Font, which is hardcoded in a spritesheet, so you may not set Dialogue Font.
ui.new-preset-menu.title: New Preset
ui.new-preset-menu.name: Name
ui.obsolete-page.paragraph:
Font Settings menu has been seperated from game menu.
Try to press '{{hotkey}}' instead to open a standalone one.
config.example-text.description: Text for adjustion when setting fonts. '\n' means a line break. I suggest you to use one line break, i.e, two lines, so you can recognize line spacing more.
config.max-spacing.description: Max horizontal spacing between two characters.
config.min-spacing.description: Min horizontal spacing between two characters.
config.font-menu-key.description: Key-binding to open a font settings menu.
config.font-settings-in-game-menu.descri: Whether to add a tab into the game menu to configure fonts.
